author: Madeleine Rapp
description: Boozy and floral with a hint of sweetness to smooth and harmonise, this after-dinner cocktail, originally served straight-up in a coupe (as presented here) but we prefer ours on-the-rocks.
name: Mirror Match
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
